alerts.selectNumberField: Retrieve data like title, likes count, etc., based on Xiaohongshu article link
alerts.selectGroupFieldTip: Plugin can automatically create selected fields. For mapping, ensure the field names in the multidimensional table match the option names. Suggest text type for 'Blogger', number type for 'xx Count', and date type for 'xx Time'. 'Total Interaction Count' can be computed from multiple fields
